subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Game 1 hinged on Henrik Lundqvist’s saves — one in particular, stealing what seemed a sure goal off the stick of forward Patrik Elias in the second period with the game tied at 1-1.
snippet: Game 1 hinged on Henrik Lundqvist’s saves — one in particular, stealing what seemed a sure goal off the stick of forward Patrik Elias in the second period with the game tied at 1-1.
